name: Moles Totalis
description:
Simple platformer where you need to care not only about your hp, but also not exceeding the limit of X (some value of a certain stat that is calculated by summing up all the character's on the map value of this stat).

Game has 10 levels:

1-4: All the applied damage on map can't be more than X

5-8: All the shots fired on map can't be more than Y

9-10: All the jumps made on map can't be more than Z
